name: Easter Egg Fight Free
description: Spring is in the air! Get in the mood for Easter with this funny action game. The Easter Bunny is struggling with the eggs. The eggs have attacked the Bunny. Eggs are attacking from both sides and you have to help the Bunny to fight against them. Play this mesmerizing game filled with many challenges and 3 wonderful backgrounds. There will be limited time base round, in each round you have to punch and kick them off and you'll be rewarded with points. This is a game of timing, so hit the eggs at the right time. The game has infinite rounds to play. There are no lives to lose, as this is a time base game, but you will lose the points, if egg hits the Bunny. Enjoy this exciting, fast-paced action game and get engaged until long after Easter!
